description:
When your temples are made of wood, and your elaborate religious works of art are also made of wood, fire is bad news. Thankfully a pair of sculpting aces like Unkei and Kaikei around to make up for any lost works!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hotoke-sama o Tsukuru Otoko-tachi, Unkei Kaikei!
The Men Who Make Buddhas, Unkei and Kaikei!
仏様を造る男たち, 運慶・快慶!
